title: [Gameplay] Minimizing Game
body:
- I play on a Mac
- I play Full screen
- Never had this problem before
- Ive dealt with tons of other bugs on Mac clients but this one is the most frustrating
- I've tried it on both clients (New and Old)
- I just bought a new computer so the game has been recently installed, therefore the problem happens in my old iMac and in my new MacBook Pro as well.

- Since the new client has been released, every time I minimize my screen to for example check my browser or email during loading screen or even answer a Skype call during my game and then come back into it my game, it freezes completely and I have to constantly try to minimize my screen up to 10 times to get it fix. It is impossible to play like this. Ive been stuck at the fountain tons of times because of this problem coming out of the loading screen. 

Please fix this problem

replies.body: same problem need help was working on my old MacBook Pro now with new pro just freezes
